nodes.text: Gannir Executive Suites was a skyscraper in the Incorporation Islands district of the planet Corellia.

During the Battle of Corellia, the Emperor's Wrath—with intelligence from the Emperor's Hand—intercepted a SIS Assassin who landed on the building's roof with a Rendaran-class assault shuttle.[source?] The SIS assassin was one of three sent by Darth Baras to kill Darth Vowrawn on the planet. A confrontation ensued, and the assassin was ultimately killed by the Wrath, who proceeded to take down the third assassin on a nearby skyscraper.
At the time, several Corellians dissatisfied with the Sith Empire's occupation gathered there, as did some Imperial sympathisers and propagandists.
